<NEW>

But BLACKARACHNIA was trickier.  WASPINATOR had been carrying=
 a large load of supplies for the group which had been dropped when he had =
been set upon by KILLER PUCNH.

She SMIRKED then, landing in a graceful som=
mersault from the clusmy swing, "Oh?"  Her spinnerettes going up, her then =
firing over her machine guns over at the munitions, energon cubes, and othe=
r spare things WASPINATOR had been carrying, moving over to detonate them!
=

While KILLER PUNCH would be nowhere near the blast radius to be hit by the=
 explosion in all likelihood, an energon fueled fire and consumables would =
be no doubt hopefully quite distracting over for him and give the femme tim=
e to flee, abandoning WASINATOR to his fate!

Assuming that the explosive f=
ire and the resulting blaze in the jungle had her opponent distracted, she =
would switch to BEAST MODE To scuttle away in the darkness!
